description:
The one who suddenly appears before Hiyori and the others was Higuma who replaced his body to take the form of Bio-Token No. 9. Before Higuma stands Eclair. Her true identity is Rinpu`s older sister and the one Mikhail said he wanted to defeat, Reira Kanagi. Naomitsu and the others pause as Reira boldly challenges Higuma. However, Rinpu does not understand the reason why Reira would challenge Higuma to battle. Moreover, Higuma indicates that Reira seems to have fought against Higuma before...? During her battle with Higuma, Reira begins to talk about the truth of her employment as a Guardian and her reason to fight Higuma.
Source: Crunchyroll
